fio.desc: A Decentralized Service Layer for Cryptocurrency Transactions.

everipedia.desc: Everipedia+PredIQt is a decentralized knowledge base and DeFi platform that includes a prediction market, money market, and synthetic asset system. The IQ token powers all applications and is used for governance of the system.

ogx.desc: OGX is the basic token on Organix protocol, which can be used as collateral to mint oUSD. oUSD is the stable coin in the whole system, the system always values 1 oUSD at 1 USD. Assets can be exchanged with oUSD on the synthethic exchange of Organix system through prices supplied by an oracle, included but not limited to fiat currencies, commodities, cryptocurrencies and their inverse assets.

pizza.desc: PIZZA.LIVE - An EOS based decentralized financial platform

anime.desc: Anime news, previews from manga and anime series and reviews from your favorite series around the anime world. Join in and talk about your favorite characters or franchises.

box.desc: A professional one-stop DeFi application platform on EOS

smart.desc: SmartCash is a project born out of the desire to create a viable, fast, merchant oriented, user friendly and community driven cryptocurrency with a decentralized governance system.

bitshares.desc: Bitshares is a peer-to-peer distributed ledger and network that can issue collateralized market-pegged smart coins known as bitAssets.

discussionsdev.desc: A place to discuss how to build better Discussions

wombat.desc: Wombat is the the most simple EOS & Telos wallet to access Games and Defi with free accounts and transactions.

qbe.desc: Qubicles is the next global phase in contact center services, bringing together employers and agents through its decentralized network.

kanda.desc: Telokanda is a Telos Smart Contract + EOSIO + Steem based social advertising platform where users can buy and sell ads and get rewarded for taking actions

tlosdac.desc: TelosDAC is a community owned block producer on various EOSIO blockchains. The TlosDAC token will be used by members to exercise their stake in the BP through custodian elections, support for worker proposals and project selection.

sqrl.desc: The SQRL token provides free CPU and NET to Telos users, as well as VIP status for consuming (or purchasing) various quantities of SQRL tokens within the wallet.

gem.desc: GEM is a utility token for all Gemslab games. Starting with Angry Warlord, you can use your GEM token to upgrade your players and buy new abilities in the game.

sand.desc: San Diego Coin SAND is a local blockchain cryptocurrency and social media dapp where every City Resident gets 1 token

alcor.desc: Alcor.exchange is a DEX provides limit/market trading(onchain matching) with zero fee, implemented entirely on contracts, with the ability to independently open new markets(self-listing).

parler.desc: Parler is an unbiased social media focused on real user experiences and engagement. Free expression without violence and no censorship.
